transcript:
this is you and this is life
[Music]
because sometimes life does that right
sometimes we get chips and cracks and
other times we get completely shattered
and all we want to do is go back to the
way things were but it's impossible
right all we can do is start doing the
work to rebuild now kimsugi is a
japanese process of repairing broken
objects and turning them into something
even more beautiful than the original
piece so they repair not to hide the
cracks but to highlight them with gold
and celebrate their values so they
become a part of the story and not the
end of the story now the repair just
like healing takes a lot of work and
effort but instead of throwing things
away or pretending the worst never
happened we give those cracks meaning by
using them to enhance the thing as a
whole and celebrating the fact that they
helped you to become who you are today
hit like and follow for more
